thread.title: Harry Fisher
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Harry Fisher

author: Harry Fisher
title: Harry Fisher
text:
I needed to replace a shower pump ASAP .
I found the same pump on the Shower doctors website choose the next day delivery before 12 noon. I was kept updated with the delivery process and it arrived at 10am and was fitted and working before 4pm. Very pleased with their service.
